title: compress/testdata: Mark.Twain-Tom.Sawyer.txt is licensed under non-free license
body:
Mark.Twain-Tom.Sawyer.txt under compress/testdata is licensed under non-free license "Project Gutenberg license". As book itself is in Public Domain I'm proposing to remove the current non-free license from the file including all references to "Project Gutenberg" .

This issue affects all branches of golang source tree including this file. And think it should be fixed in all supported release.

If this change is acceptable/accepted, I will provide patch for review in gerrit.
